translations: adj.木质的；多树木的；木头似的；像木头味的

sentences.sentence: Woody Allen makes me just break up.
sentences.translation: 伍迪•艾伦令我几乎笑破肚皮。

sentences.sentence: Care must be taken when trimming around woody plants like shrubs and trees.
sentences.translation: 修剪像灌木和乔木这样的木本植物必须小心翼翼。

sentences.sentence: She dedicated her first album to Woody Allen, who she says understands her obsession.
sentences.translation: 她把她的第一张唱片献给伍迪·艾伦，她说艾伦理解她的痴迷。
